Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 4th overall pick, by Detroit in 2013...
Had first career hit on 4/6/2015, off Bud Norris (OAK)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/7/2015, off Michael Hisey (OAK)...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/20/2015, hitting .375 with 5 HR, 14 RBI...
Injured on 6/23/2016 with a Pulled Thigh Muscle, out for one week...
Drove in 7 runs against Minnesota on 8/22/2016...
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/11/2017, hitting .556 with 4 HR, 11 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 10/2/2017, hitting .435 with 4 HR, 11 RBI...
Won World Championship with Detroit in 2017...
Had 6 hits with 5 RBI against Oakland on 6/27/2019...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Injured on 4/12/2021 with a Inflamed Hip Muscle, out for one week...
Was selected to the 2021 Allstar game...
Won Gold Glove Award at Centerfield in 2021...
Drove in 6 runs against Chicago (A) on 7/26/2023...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/20/2024, hitting .560 with 3 HR, 10 RBI...
Was selected to the 2024 Allstar game...
Won Gold Glove Award at Centerfield in 2024...
